ace-playbook-generation.description: Auto-generated technical plan documents for ACE pattern implementation with frontmatter metadata
patterns: YAML frontmatter with pattern_id, type, updated timestamp
Structured markdown sections: Summary, Technical Context, Implementation Approach, Success Criteria, Examples

ace-pattern-tracking.description: Pattern metadata system tracking pattern IDs, types, domains, and confidence scores
patterns: Hyphenated pattern ID format with domain prefix and numeric suffix

ace-training-pipeline.description: Offline training system for pattern discovery and refinement through epoch-based learning
patterns: Request ID generation with hash suffix
Epoch-based statistics tracking (patterns_processed, patterns_refined, confidence deltas)

playbook-directory-structure.description: Numbered playbook organization with descriptive directory names and multi-file documentation
patterns: Kebab-case descriptive names with parenthetical parameter lists
Multiple documentation files per playbook (plan.md, insights.md implied)

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Documentation generation with structured frontmatter and standardized sections for machine readability

evolutionary-learning-system.description: Self-improving pattern recognition through confidence tracking and iterative refinement

request-response-queue.description: Asynchronous processing pattern with unique request identifiers and paired request/response files

hierarchical-documentation.description: Multi-level documentation structure organizing content by numbering and descriptive categorization

machine-readable-human-friendly.description: Generate documentation that is both parseable by machines (YAML frontmatter, JSON) and readable by humans (markdown, descriptive names)

evidence-based-improvement.description: Track confidence metrics and statistics to measure pattern effectiveness and guide refinement

self-documenting-identifiers.description: Use descriptive naming conventions that convey purpose without requiring external documentation

temporal-versioning.description: Include timestamps and version indicators to track evolution and enable temporal analysis

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths, frontmatter metadata, and document structure
metadata.analysis_notes: Single document analysis revealing ACE playbook generation system with multi-epoch training, confidence tracking, and structured markdown documentation patterns
